name: Whimsically
description:
Features: 
- Optimized for 1366 x 768 screen resolution 
- Beautiful textured backgrounds 
- Custom Tumblr logo 
- Ribbon menu buttons
additional_info:
YOU MAY NEED TO RE-SIZE TO FIT YOUR SCREEN
Once installed, you may have to follow these instructions: - Go up to the Sylish icon on your browser (top right) - Right click on it and click on "Options" - Scroll down to Divine Lace theme and click on "Edit" - Where is says "Applies to", from the drop down menu click on "URL's starting with" - Then in the text box next to that, type in "http://www.tumblr.com/" - Click save & refresh Tumblr. Then everything should work just fine! :)
